title: MIT timed drug release tech opens door to self-boosting vaccines
author: Nick Paul Taylor
description: From childhood immunizations to COVID-19, multiple, staggered vaccine doses are key to providing full protection against pathogens. | From childhood immunizations to COVID-19, multiple, staggered vaccine doses are key to providing full protection against pathogens. But can the doses be delivered all at once and lie dormant until the right time? That is the question at the heart of new research from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
